Kelana Jaya Line Update:   Trains have been taken out of service at Kelana Jaya and Subang Alam Station due to a technical disruption.   This will temporarily affect train frequency, which will be automatically adjusted.  We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
SERVICE UPDATE  Please be informed that congestion is expected at interchange and connecting stations.  Passengers at connecting stations may consider using the following alternative train routes:

Dang Wangi Please use the Monorail to Bukit Nanas.   Masjid Jamek Please use the LRT Ampang / Sri Petaling Line.  Passengers are advised to plan their journey in advance and follow the latest updates via the PULSE app and Rapid KL’s official social media channels.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your cooperation.

Train services are experiencing delays due to a technical issue affecting track components between Kwasa Damansara Station and Sungai Buloh Station. Repair works are currently in progress.  Alternative train services have been activated as follows:

1. Trains from Sungai Buloh will turn back at Putrajaya Sentral. 2. Shuttle train services are operating between Kwasa Damansara and Sungai Buloh.  Please follow our official channels for further updates.

Kemas Kini Laluan LRT Kelana Jaya: Kerja baik pulih mengeluarkan halangan objek asing di landasan berhampiran Stesen Kerinchi telah selesai dijalankan.   Perkhidmatan tren alternatif telah ditamatkan.
Kelana Jaya LRT Line Update: Repair work to remove foreign object obstacles on the tracks near Kerinchi Station has been completed.  The alternative train service has been discontinued.
The schedule is being adjusted and train services will resume normal operations shortly.  We apologize for the inconvenience caused and thank you for your patience.

Kemas Kini Laluan LRT Kelana Jaya: Perkhidmatan tren sedang mengalami kelewatan kerana terdapat halangan objek asing di landasan berhampiran Stesen Kerinchi. Kerja baik pulih sedang dijalankan.  Perkhidmatan tren alternatif telah diaktifkan seperti berikut:

1. Train from Putra Heights will end service at Asia Jaya Station platform 2 and turn back to Putra Heights. 2. Shuttle train between Asia Jaya Station and Universiti at platform 1. 3. Train from Gombak will end service at Universiti platform 1 and turn back to Gombak.
As a safety procedure, trains will stop for longer at platforms.  Follow us for further updates.  We apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you for your patience.

Kemaskini Laluan LRT Kelana Jaya: Kerja baik pulih gangguan teknikal pada landasan di Stesen Universiti telah selesai dijalankan.  Perkhidmatan tren alternatif dan bas perantara percuma akan ditamatkan.

LRT Kelana Jaya Line Update: The repair work for the technical disruption on the tracks at Universiti Station has been completed.  Alternative train services and free shuttle buses will be discontinued.
The schedule is being adjusted and train services will resume normal operations shortly.  We apologize for the inconvenience caused and thank you for your patience.
